lines.content: Arvee is a simple personal task manager chatbot built in Java.
It helps you keep track of todos, deadlines, and events, directly from the command line or a graphical user interface (GUI) built with JavaFX.
- `deadline`: Add a deadline with a due date/time
- `event`: Add an event with start/end times
- `list`: View all tasks in the list
- `mark` / `unmark`: Mark tasks as done or not done
- Saved tasks are reloaded the next time you start Arvee
- Deadlines and events accept dates in `yyyy-MM-dd` or `yyyy-MM-dd HHmm` format
- Displayed in a human-friendly format, e.g. `Oct 15 2019`
- Messages appear as chat bubbles (user on right, Arvee on left)
- Auto-scrolling and input disabled on exit command (`bye`)
\- Gradle (wrapper included, no need to install separately)
